org.vertx.java.core.impl

Class ConnectionPool<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.core.impl.ConnectionPool<T>

  • public abstract class ConnectionPool<T>
extends java.lang.Object

    A simple, non-blocking pool implementation

    • Method Detail

      • setMaxPoolSize

        public void setMaxPoolSize(int maxConnections)
        Set the maximum pool size to the value specified by maxConnections

        The client will maintain up to maxConnections HTTP connections in an internal pool

        Returns the maximum number of connections in the pool
